mapper.select: select R.*, P.* from review R left join product P on R.productNum = P.productNum where R.reviewer=#{reviewer} order by R.reviewNum desc limit #{startRow}, #{perPage}

select * from review where productNum=#{productNum}
and reviewer=#{reviewer}
mapper.insert: insert into review (productNum, reviewer, reviewee, type, locationCode, state, manner, speed, reviewContent) values (#{productNum}, #{reviewer}, #{reviewee}, #{type}, #{locationCode}, #{state}, #{manner}, #{speed}, #{reviewContent})
mapper.select: SELECT ROUND(AVG(state)) avgState, ROUND(AVG(manner)) avgManner, ROUND(AVG(speed)) avgSpeed, COUNT(state) countState, COUNT(manner) countManner, COUNT(speed) countSpeed FROM review WHERE reviewee=#{reviewee}
